entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
